Scripts.OnVerticalScroll: FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(self, offset, OF_BROWSE_FILTER_HEIGHT, function() OFAuctionFrameFilters_Update() end);

Scripts.OnEditFocusGained: if self:GetText() == OF_BROWSE_SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER then self:SetText("") end EditBox_HighlightText(self)
Scripts.OnTabPressed: if ( not IsShiftKeyDown() ) then OFBrowseMinLevel:SetFocus() end
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip_SetDefaultAnchor(GameTooltip, self) GameTooltip_SetTitle(GameTooltip, AUCTION_TOOLTIP_BROWSE_BY_NAME_TITLE) GameTooltip_AddNormalLine(GameTooltip, AUCTION_TOOLTIP_BROWSE_BY_NAME_BODY, true) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == "" then self:SetText(OF_NOTE_PLACEHOLDER) end EditBox_ClearHighlight(self)
Scripts.OnEditFocusGained: if self:GetText() == OF_NOTE_PLACEHOLDER then self:SetText("") end EditBox_HighlightText(self)
